availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky druggist. Maryland native. Married to Emma Wilder. Father of Emma Wilder, and Graham Wilder.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, [State], [County], [City/District], p. 128. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 7, p. 90. Find A Grave, "James Bennett Wilder (1817-1888)," Memorial #98347793, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=98347793&ref=acom (accessed May, 30, 2017).
